## Requirement Checking

library(library, pypi_name=None, prompt_install=False)[source]

Click decorator to ensure a library is installed.

binary(names: List[str] | str, logical_operator=LogicalOperators.AND, key=None)[source]

key(names: Dict[str, str | List[str]], stores: List[ImplementsGet], logical_operator=LogicalOperators.OR)[source]

Click decorator to ensure that at least one of the possible API key names is set in the store.
